setting.name: enable
setting.label: Enable
setting.description: If disabled the lightbox JavaScript will not be loaded.

setting.name: title_position
setting.label: Title Position
setting.description: You can set the position where the title is displayed.

setting.name: transition_in
setting.label: Transition In
setting.description: You can set the transition used when the lightbox is shown.

setting.name: transition_out
setting.label: Transition Out
setting.description: You can set the transition used when the lightbox hides.

setting.name: overlay_show
setting.label: Show Overlay
setting.description: Enable/Disable the overlay to create a modal lightbox.

setting.name: overlay_color
setting.label: Overlay Color
setting.description: Color of the lightbox overlay. Use a hex color value.

setting.name: overlay_opacity
setting.label: Overlay Opacity
setting.description: Opacity of the lightbox overlay. Pick a value between 0.1 and 1.0

setting.name: selector
setting.label: Selector
setting.description: You can customize the default selector to activate the lightbox on other link elements.
